name: Pong (itch) (Yfou)
description:
Pong clone done in Unity.  

+ Move using Up and Down or using W and S
+ Player vs AI
+ Player and AI have speed limits
+ The ball gets faster as it hits the paddle

There is also an .exe file to download. Look below.

----
BUGS: I was told there is a bug where the ball gets stuck between a paddle and a wall, but I wasn't able to reproduce this bug.

----
Sound effects made using https://sfxr.me/
